file(COPY  bad_dot_dc_line.cir bad_dot_dc_line.cir.sh tags options DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad_dot_dc_line.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_644_SON/bad_dot_dc_line.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bad_dot_dc_line.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bad_dot_dc_line.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_644_SON/bad_dot_dc_line.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_644_SON/bad_dot_dc_line.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;bug644son;errorexit")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_644_SON/bad_dot_dc_line.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bad_dot_dc_line.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bad_dot_dc_line.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_644_SON/bad_dot_dc_line.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_644_SON/bad_dot_dc_line.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;bug644son;errorexit")
endif()
